name: Dunked on
description:
Don't get Dunked on by your friend. He's gets more and more jealous the more trophies you collect. He will try to dunk on you to get revenge. He might be crazy but he dunks on you harder the more trophies you have.

Controls: 

Press 'P' to pause the game. WASD or Arrow keys to move. Use mouse to look around in first person. Spacebar to jump.
